actions.args: {"body": {"name": "Summary of Work Activities: NEAR DevHub/Hackbox Design Lead (Sept 1 - 30, 2024)", "summary": "Summary of Work Activities: NEAR DevHub/Hackbox Design Lead (September 1 - 30, 2024)", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**Breakdown + deliverables:**\\\\n\\\\nEvents: \\\\n- Singapore: brand treatment, custom illustration, printed collateral design (stickers, flyers, keyring etc), swag \\\\n- SF: brand treatment, custom illustration, printed collateral design (stickers, flyers, keyring etc), swag\\\\n- Chiang Mai HH: rollup banner, T-shirts\\\\n- Devcon: brand treatment, custom T-shirt design, print design deliverables (stickers, keychains etc)\\\\n\\\\n[Redacted]: \\\\n- Hacker zone design: R&D, art-direction, calls, deliverables\\\\n- Hacker\\\\u{2019}s interactive T-shirt design\\\\n- Brand treatment: fruit stickers, sriracha stickers, keyring, etc.\\\\n\\\\nHackbox:\\\\n- Hackbox website design: prototype\\\\n- City Nodes brand development, shareable design assets&templates\\\\n- City nodes animation for social media/events\\\\n\\\\nExpenses: fonts for brand treatments +30$\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 100 hours\\\\nHourly rate: $55\\\\nExpences: 30$\\\\nService fee: $5530", "linked_proposals": [35], "receiver_account": "sashapais.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "5530", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Hackbox", "Event sponsorship", "Other"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 130950552}

{"body": {"name": "NearStack team expenses for REDICTED HACKATHON Bangkok Nov 9 - 11", "summary": "Hi, I\\\\u{2019}m @pichtran.near . I\\\\u{2019}m seeking support for travel expenses, including airfare and accommodation, for my stay in Bangkok from November 8 to April 11. Any assistance or recommendations for affordable lodging options would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "### **Introduction:**\\\\nNearstack focuses on simplifying frontend development for Web3 by utilizing NEAR BOS components, enhanced by AI-generated code suggestions. We have created a platform that allows developers to visualize component relationships through a React flow interface. This approach makes it easier to understand how different components interact, improving developer efficiency and contributing to the growing NEAR ecosystem.\\\\n\\\\n### **Purpose:**\\\\nWe are passionate about advancing our project and making a meaningful contribution to the NEAR ecosystem. We see a lot of potential in our platform to create real-world value by streamlining development processes with AI and BOS components. The Bangkok hackathon offers an incredible opportunity for us to take this project further, engage with like-minded developers, and learn from the NEAR community. Attending the event will help us refine our vision and push the boundaries of what\\\\\\'s possible with our project.\\\\n\\\\n### **Request for Travel Stipend:**\\\\nWe are seeking assistance with flights to Bangkok, which cost approximately $350 per person. We would also greatly appreciate staying at a NEAR Hackerhouse if available. If not, we request up to $200 per person for accommodation. We are not requesting any additional funds for food or miscellaneous expenses, as we plan to cover those ourselves.\\\\n\\\\nDeparture: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam \\\\u{2192} Bangkok, Thailand\\\\n\\\\nReturn: Bangkok, Thailand \\\\u{2192} Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam\\\\n\\\\n### **Estimated breakdown:**\\\\n\\\\n- Flight cost per person: $350\\\\n- Accommodation cost per person: $200\\\\n- Team size: 4 students\\\\n- Request per student: $500 (Capping according to T&C)\\\\n- Total: $2000 (We can pay $1500 for ourselves)\\\\n- Total request: $500\\\\n\\\\n### **About Our Project: Frontend Flow with NEAR BOS and AI**\\\\nOur project integrates NEAR BOS components with AI-driven code suggestions to simplify the frontend development process. We provide a visual React flow interface, allowing developers to see how components interact. This approach enhances the efficiency and clarity of development workflows, particularly within decentralized applications. By contributing to the NEAR ecosystem, we aim to make Web3 development more accessible to all.\\\\nExplore ours project apply to REDACTED Bangkok: https://www.nearstack.weminal.com/\\\\n\\\\n### **Past Project:**\\\\nWedata - 3RD Native track at Web3Hackfest: https://devfolio.co/projects/wedata-3418\\\\nFastUI - Fast component UI on BOS at BOS hacks: https://near.social/fastui.near/widget/FastUI\\\\nBOS wallet - BOS wallet on NearSocial at BOS hacks: https://near.social/pichtran.near/widget/BOSwallet\\\\n\\\\n### **About my team:**\\\\nPhuc Tinh: AI engineer; First author of a paper at PACLIC 37 Conference (2023) - Rank C; Co-author of a paper in Neural Computing and Applications journal (Q1, accepted 2024).\\\\nQuiVo: Blockchain Developer; 3RD Native track at Web3Hackfest with Wedata.\\\\nTung Le: Technical Lead.\\\\nLoc Hoang: Fullstack Developer.\\\\nPich Tran: Blockchain Developer.\\\\n\\\\nWhy We Need the Support\\\\nAs students, we are managing most expenses on our own, but the flight costs present a challenge. This travel stipend would enable us to attend the hackathon and focus fully on building our project and contributing to the NEAR ecosystem, rather than worrying about travel logistics.\\\\n\\\\n### **Conclusion:**\\\\nWe are excited about the opportunity to participate in the Bangkok hackathon and continue developing on NEAR. Your support would help us cover the necessary travel costs and allow us to concentrate on our project. Thank you for considering our proposal.\\\\n\\\\nBest regards,\\\\n\\\\n@pichtran.near\\\\n\\\\nTeam Nearstack", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "fastui.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Bounty", "Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 130993978}

I\\\\u{2019}m seeking support for travel expenses, including airfare and accommodation, for my stay in Bangkok from November 8 to April 11. Any assistance or recommendations for affordable lodging options would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=102)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

Your support would help us cover the necessary travel costs and allow us to concentrate on our project. Thank you for considering our proposal.\\\\n\\\\nBest regards,\\\\n\\\\n@pichtran.near\\\\n\\\\nTeam Nearstack", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "fastui.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "fastui.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Updated - Trove Labs Travel Stipend [REDACTED] - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "Hello! I am Brandon Cantu, and along with my co-founder David Leer, we are Trove Labs! We have been in the NEAR ecosystem for over 3 years. We have built multiple projects on NEAR protocol and are core contributors for Neko, and Jump DeFi! We will be traveling from Washington State to Bangkok to participate in [REDACTED]! We will be submitting our own project.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**NOTE: I have updated the proposal to seperate team members as requested. David will provide own proposal.**\\\\n\\\\n**NEAR Contributions**\\\\nWe have activley contributed to the NEAR ecosystem by launching Neko, Jump DeFi, hosting Near at Night, and creating video content. We will be traveling from Seattle Washington and will be creating a hackathoin submission using Bitte AI agents!\\\\n\\\\n**Prior Hackathons**\\\\nNearcon 2022 - *Participated but did not submit project\\\\n\\\\nWe are active builders in the NEAR community and have multiple projects we maintain in the ecosystem. We are asking to be considered for a stipend to help subsidize our particpation in this years [Redacted] conference.\\\\n\\\\n**Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs for Brandon**\\\\nDeparting from SEA\\\\nLanding at BKK\\\\n\\\\nFlights: $1200 USD\\\\nTotal Estimated Cost: $2200 USD (requesting a $1000 stipend)\\\\n\\\\nProject Plan\\\\nWe have a submission in progress and once we are ready, we will submit through Devpost. We are also traveling to participate in Olympic Village and create content with the Build DAO House, in an effort to cover hackathon teams and what they ahve built! Once submitted, I will update this proposal with the URL to my project submissions.\\\\n\\\\nThank you for your consideration!", "linked_proposals": [92], "receiver_account": "trovelabs.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Travel expenses", "Hackathon", "Bounty"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131035508}

I am Brandon Cantu, and along with my co-founder David Leer, we are Trove Labs! We have been in the NEAR ecosystem for over 3 years. We will be submitting our own project.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "editor_id": "trovelabs.near", "timestamp": "1729712804276941924", "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**NOTE: I have updated the proposal to seperate team members as requested. David will provide own proposal.**\\\\n\\\\n**NEAR Contributions**\\\\nWe have activley contributed to the NEAR ecosystem by launching Neko, Jump DeFi, hosting Near at Night, and creating video content. We will be traveling from Seattle Washington and will be creating a hackathoin submission using Bitte AI agents!\\\\n\\\\n**Prior Hackathons**\\\\nNearcon 2022 - *Participated but did not submit project\\\\n\\\\nWe are active builders in the NEAR community and have multiple projects we maintain in the ecosystem. We are asking to be considered for a stipend to help subsidize our particpation in this years [Redacted] conference.\\\\n\\\\n**Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs for Brandon**\\\\nDeparting from SEA\\\\nLanding at BKK\\\\n\\\\nFlights: $1200 USD\\\\nTotal Estimated Cost: $2200 USD (requesting a $1000 stipend)\\\\n\\\\nProject Plan\\\\nWe have a submission in progress and once we are ready, we will submit through Devpost. Once submitted, I will update this proposal with the URL to my project submissions.\\\\n\\\\nThank you for your consideration!", "linked_proposals": [92], "receiver_account": "trovelabs.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "trovelabs.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Trove Labs Travel Stipend - David [REDACTED] - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "I am David, the co-founder of Trove Labs and we have been building in the NEAR ecosystem full time for over 3 years (Neko and Jump DeFi). We are traveling from Washington State to Bangkok to participate in the [REDACTED] hackathon. We are submitting our own project. \\\\n", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**NEAR Contributions**\\\\nWe have actively contributed to the NEAR ecosystem as founders launching projects and products such as Neko, Jump DeFi, Aggregated AI, and NEAR AI Chat. We also produce content for the NEAR community and host the Near at Night Twitter Spaces show. Traveling from Seattle, Washington, we are submitting a hackathon project that leverages Bitte AI agents.\\\\n\\\\n**Prior Hackathons**\\\\nNearcon 2022: Participated but did not submit a project.\\\\n\\\\nAs active builders in the NEAR community, we maintain multiple projects within the ecosystem. We are requesting consideration for a stipend to help subsidize our participation in this year\\\\u{2019}s [Redacted] conference.\\\\n\\\\n**Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs**\\\\nDeparture: SEA\\\\nArrival: BKK\\\\n\\\\nFlights: ~$1,200 USD per person\\\\nTotal Estimated Cost: $1,200 USD (requesting a $1,000 stipend)\\\\n\\\\n**Project Plan**\\\\nWe have a project submission in progress and will submit it through Devpost once completed. Additionally, we are participating in Olympic Village and creating content with the Build DAO House, covering hackathon teams and their projects. Once submitted, I will update this proposal with the project submission URL. ", "linked_proposals": [103], "receiver_account": "trovelabs.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131062226}
